00033 #ifndef __DHCPC_H__
00034 #define __DHCPC_H__
00035 
00036 struct dhcpc_state {
00037   struct pt pt;
00038   char state;
00039   struct uip_udp_conn *conn;
00040   struct etimer etimer;
00041   u32_t ticks;
00042   const void *mac_addr;
00043   int mac_len;
00044   
00045   u8_t serverid[4];
00046 
00047   u16_t lease_time[2];
00048   uip_ipaddr_t ipaddr;
00049   uip_ipaddr_t netmask;
00050   uip_ipaddr_t dnsaddr;
00051   uip_ipaddr_t default_router;
00052 };
00053 
00054 void dhcpc_init(const void *mac_addr, int mac_len);
00055 void dhcpc_request(void);
00056 
00057 void dhcpc_appcall(process_event_t ev, void *data);
00058 
00059 /* Mandatory callbacks provided by the user. */
00060 void dhcpc_configured(const struct dhcpc_state *s);
00061 void dhcpc_unconfigured(const struct dhcpc_state *s);
00062 
00063 #endif /* __DHCPC_H__ */
